body.content:
Greetings
I know this would come to you as a surprise. i am Mrs. Mean,
a born again Christian i'm a widow I lost my
beloved husband 14th of April 2014.
Thereafter life seems to be unfair
to me, suffering from Cancer.

I have been at the HOSPITAL in Scotland London, where i am
admitted for over eleven(11) months, because of cancer problem. cancer
of uterus. My doctor has recommended surgery, which is coming up in
few days time.

I decided to donate the sum of $3,600,000.00 US Dollars (Three Million Six
hundred thousand United States dollars) to the less privileged because
I cannot take this money to the grave. I have signed for the surgery
which is life or death my life is only in the hands of God Almighty,
which is the reason i decided to donate the funds since i have no
child of my own. Please take 20% and use 80% for the poor and needy.

I believe in my heart you can handle this. Once I hear from you, all
details will be given to you, for my bank to release the funds to you. my private email.
( mean75234@gmail.com ) reply to my mail.

Thanks and God bless you.
Mean
